      • dataGrid

        @RequestMapping(value="areas/datagrid",
                method=POST)
public com.alibaba.fastjson.JSONObject dataGrid​(@RequestBody
                                                com.bandweaver.tunnel.common.biz.vo.AreaVo areaVo)
        区域分页查询
        参数:
        name - 区域名称（支持模糊查询）
        tunnelId - 管廊id
        startTime -
        endTime -
        pageNum - 必须
        pageSize - 必须
        返回:
        {"msg":"请求成功","code":"200","data":{"total":26,"list":[{"id":1,"name":"区域1","location":"位置1","tunnel":{"id":1,"name":"凤岭北路"},"camera":"1111-2222-333","crtTime":1532499849000},{"id":2,"name":"长虹路-区域-0","location":"长虹路-区域-0-位置","tunnel":{"id":2,"name":"长虹路"},"camera":null,"crtTime":1529903396000}],"pageNum":1,"pageSize":2,"size":2,"startRow":1,"endRow":2,"pages":13,"prePage":0,"nextPage":2,"isFirstPage":true,"isLastPage":false,"hasPreviousPage":false,"hasNextPage":true,"navigatePages":8,"navigatepageNums":[1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8],"navigateFirstPage":1,"navigateLastPage":8,"firstPage":1,"lastPage":8}}
